function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited real-world studies on the application of upper room ultra-violet (UV) germicidal irradiation","Impact":"Uncertain effectiveness of the method in mitigating airborne transmission","Mitigation":"Conduct further real-world studies to validate the effectiveness of the method","Technologies":"Real-world studies, data collection and analysis","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Complex sizing and installation of upper room UV systems","Impact":"Risk of incorrect installation leading to unsafe UV-C irradiation levels","Mitigation":"Ensure systems are installed by trained professionals and follow safety guidelines","Technologies":"Professional installation techniques, safety guidelines","People":"Installation professionals, building owners","Owner":"Installation professionals, building owners"},{"Description":"Potential health risks from prolonged exposure to UV light and generation of harmful by-products","Impact":"Skin and eye damage, exposure to ozone and other harmful by-products","Mitigation":"Provide warnings and safety guidelines for occupants, monitor UV-C irradiation levels, use UV lamps with low ozone generation","Technologies":"Warning signs, safety guidelines, monitoring systems, low-ozone UV lamps","People":"Occupants, building management","Owner":"Building management, health and safety organizations"}]}
